title: Pumpkin and Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['110g margarine', '300g caster sugar', '1 egg', '250g pumpkin puree', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '65g chopped walnuts', '170g plain chocolate chips']
